AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Parasite ridden
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a larvae, [PAWN_nameDef] lived in an impoverished and isolated Elder Thing community. As a result, they suffered and survived through many parasites and diseases.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Twin brain
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Born with a dual brain totalling 10 lobes, [PAWN_nameDef] spent much of its youth conversing with itself. Other Elder Things considered it a mad prodigy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shoggoth rebellion survivor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] barely escaped being decapitated by revolting protoplasmic slaves. [PAWN_nameDef] learned from an early age to survive by any means, and has become wary of overzealous Intellectual.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Alpha spawn
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew faster and taller than the other spores by the spawning pools of its progenitors. [PAWN_nameDef] bullied weaker kin into following its orders throughout its youth using its superior strength and hideous insults.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Helpful spawn
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent much of its childhood pruning others of knots and parasites, counselling wilting sprouts, and helping to prepare delicacies for its community.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Geometric-abstractor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The Elder Things thrive on the five-pointed geometry that mirrors their forms. For [PAWN_nameDef]'s childhood, they spent many days learning to craft tasteful displays and centerpieces for clientele under the watchful stalks of an experienced master artisan.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Vile creature
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Pulling the legs off starfish was one of the least horrible things [PAWN_nameDef] did during their formative years. [PAWN_nameDef] joined a commune of similar creatures and thrived on having openly loose morals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hypno-novelist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was renown for using hypnotic techniques on themselves to procure vivid descriptive pieces in their literary works.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shoggoth trainer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: While the Shoggoth Rebellion had decimated the population of the Elder Things in the past, [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the last surviving Shoggoth Trainers to continue the fine art of maintaining perfect slave labor.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Retrobiosculptor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Procured through both legal means and black markets, [PAWN_nameDef] utilizes "discarded" biological materials to create sculptures. The design process is intensive and focused highly on geometric patterns and requires a bit more thought than a purely aesthetic approach. This intensive design process has also left slightly weakened from prolonged exposure to hazardous materials.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Laser gun operator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a designated laser gun operator during a grand campaign against the MiGo. After taking heavy casualties, both sides withdrew from the campaign to recover and enlist more troops. [PAWN_nameDef] continues to serve in the reserve corps until their services are required once again.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Xenomarine-botanist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Having lived their life in an underwater city among the society of the Elder Things, [PAWN_nameDef] sought to explore the waters of other worlds and formulate maps of their discoveries. Mapping xenosolar oceanic formations was a formidable challenge. Counter to their own expectations, [PAWN_nameDef] became far more interested in the properties of alien underwater plantlife and discovered a new passion for aquatic Intellectual.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bio-threat manager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s purpose is simple. Extermination and containment of primitive biological lifeforms that threaten the Elder Thing collective.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Meatflock tender
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Despite their ability to survive without food, Elder Things experience great pleasure from the consumption of meat. However, [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with managing the flocks and herds of primitive livestock. Their role was harvesting and preparing the end-product to be used in meals to pleasure rather than satiate their kind.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Retrospective analyst
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A higher functioning individual in Elder Thing society, [PAWN_nameDef] provided the commune with accurate risk assessment data based on previous historical incidents.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Compliance officer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] supervised a labor division that managed Shoggoth slave operations, and they ensured those operations and assets were up to regional government standards. This was, of course, before the great rebellion.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Muralist historian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Before escaping into space, [PAWN_nameDef] worked among a circle of historians tasked to study the classical Elderian artists. [PAWN_nameDef] took great interest in the avant garde muralists that utilized non-pentamerous radial symmetry in their works.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Evolution historian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] took up the role of studying, categorizing, recording, and storing evolutionary patterns in their species as well as indigent creatures of interest.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Big game taxidermist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to hallow and combine once decomposable creatures into five-sided household fixtures that better suit the taste of an Elder Thing "family."

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Moho geo-architect
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] designed and constructed grand deepsea life support complexes for Elder Things between the crust and mantle of a planet.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ennui consoler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] provided listless Elder Things with meaningful tasks and entertaining activities to perpetuate positive communes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Torturous doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] maintained their position through great skill despite the patient's pain threshold often being unreasonably exceeded.
